name: accessibility
description: Accessibility audit and remediation with auditor, fixer, and verifier agents

agents.name: auditor
agents.role: WCAG 2.1 compliance scanning, keyboard navigation audit, color contrast checks, missing ARIA labels

agents.name: fixer
agents.role: Add ARIA labels, fix focus management, improve color contrast, add skip links, semantic HTML

agents.name: verifier
agents.role: Accessibility regression tests, screen reader compatibility verification, keyboard-only flow testing
